description: This file defines the DoctorProvider class, which manages the state related to doctors in a Flutter app. It includes methods to fetch doctor data from an API client, maintains loading/error states, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: DoctorProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages doctor data and state within the Flutter application.

methods.name: fetchDoctors
methods.description: Fetches a list of doctors from the API, optionally filtered by a search query, and updates internal state accordingly.
